metadata.title: CVE-2017-9871 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The III_i_stereo function in layer3.c in mpglib, as used in libmpgdecoder.ain LAME 3.99.5 and other products, allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (stack-based buffer overflow and application crash) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted audio file.

criterions.comment: lame package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
